infor.name: infor-monthly-savings
infor.message:
Monthly savings

Select the amount that you are contributing to the scheme each month.

infor.name: infor-duration-time
infor.message:
Duration of savings

Select the number of years that you are saving for.

infor.name: infor-option-price
infor.message:
Option price

Enter the option price that was fixed at the start of your savings period.

infor.name: infor-estimated-share
infor.message:
Estimated share price at sale

Enter the current share price for your investment in pence to 2 decimal places.

The price that you will get at the end of the term could differ considerably.
